page.title: 05SCHOOL LEAVERS
page.content: Education in the area is provided by two primary schools and one secondary school. The primaries are Penpont with a roll of 84 pupils and Wallace Hall Primary with 137 pupils. Both serve their local areas. The much larger secondary school, however, has a greater catchment area of up to 13 miles and thus a larger roll of 426 pupils. Of the 35 pupils who left this school between 4th and 5th year, 11 went on to further education, mainly at Dumfries Technical College, 19 left to start work and 5 left with no job. In the same session (1984-85) 29 pupils left between 5th and 6th year. Of these pupils 12 went on to further education, 12 left to work, 3 left with no job and 2 moved to a different school.
